answers.answer: Did you have gestational diabetes with the first? How's your blood pressure? A lot of what you're experiencing usually coincides with those two things. It's something that can easily be tackled.. Although it could easily also be extreme "morning sickness"..?
Sorry I finally figured out how to reply! Lol with my first I was borderline. Failed the first glucose test and just barely passed the second. I'm not sure on my blood pressure though

question: Hey there mommies! So I am 6 weeks along with my second baby! :) my first is 18 months old. Since yesterday I have been having awful spells of nausea, headache, sweats, dizziness, and partial vision loss (not black spots just not existant) has anyone else experienced this?
title: 2 pregnancy and concerns.
